Class Picture

java.lang.Object
  




public class Picture
extends greenfoot.Actor

A class that represents a picture. Pictures have pixels. A pixel has a color. A color object has a red, green, and blue value from 0-255 (inclusive).

          Constructor that creates an empty picture

          Constructor that creates a picture from the passed file name

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called by the Greenfoot framework. You may want to override it to automatically load a picture and carry out manipulations when the user clicks on the act button in Greenfoot.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

get2DPixels

public Pixel[][] get2DPixels()
Gets all the pixels in the picture and returns them in a two dimensional array in column-major order

Returns:
the two dimensional array of pixels in column- major order (ie [col][row].

get2DPixelsRowMajor

public Pixel[][] get2DPixelsRowMajor()
Gets all the pixels in the picture and returns them in a two dimensional array in row-major order

Returns:
the two dimensional array of pixels in row- major order (ie [row][col]).

getHeight

public int getHeight()
Method to return the height of the picture

Returns:
the height in pixels

getPixel

public Pixel getPixel(int x,
                      int y)
Gets a pixel for the given x and y location

Parameters:
x - the x location of the pixel in the picture
y - the y location of the pixel in the picture
Returns:
a Pixel object for the given location

getPixels

public Pixel[] getPixels()
Gets all pixels in this picture

Returns:
a one-dimensional array of Pixel objects, traversed in row-major order.

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Method to return the width of the picture

Returns:
the width in pixels

load

public void load(java.lang.String source)
Loads a picture from a given source.

Parameters:
source - the image source. If the source starts with http://, it is a URL, otherwise, a filename.

Displays a file chooser for picking a picture.
